title: The Impact of key performance indicators on customer satisfaction: a case study of Adidas web shop
abstract: Customers are the main reason for a business to exist and the main driver of a company's growth. With the prevalence of the internet, customers are now equipped with the necessary information to have a higher bargaining power. With the vast knowledge that the customers have, companies need to change focus by becoming a customer-centric company. Customer service is important in driving the company to achieve this goal. The reason is that the customer service department is the face and the embodiment of the company to their customers. Customers who call and communicate with customer service expect to be talking to the person that represents the brand and the company. Key Performance Indicator is typically used by customer service manager to analyze customer service performance. There are many KPIs and managers need to focus on the right KPIs that have a significant impact on customer satisfaction.
source: Undergraduate Thesis No. 34010318/MAN/2017; Samuel Claudio Santoso (34413069)
